We can take apart $\green{6}$ to make $\pink1$ and $\blue5$.  
We can put together $\pink1$ and $\blue5$ to make $\green{6}$.

question.content:
**Fill in the blanks.**  

 | | |
:-: | :-: | :-:
$6-1=$ [[☃ input-number 1]] | because | [[☃ input-number 2]] $+$ $1=6$
